title: Retro Shop Sign Font
content:
Hi

Someone must know the name of this typeface. It's ubiquitous to say the least.

Thanks

Jono

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typetest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821031009/http:/typophile.com/files/typetest_0.jpg) | 148.36 KB |
author: mrjono

comments.content: Looks like one of the [Komika-fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140821031009/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?psize=m&q=komika) from Apostrophic Labs.

Spot on Renko, Komika Axis!

Thanks
